name: ⍟ Suit of Pentacles ⍟
description: The Suit of Pentacles, also known as Diamonds, Coins or Disks, is the suit connected to Elemental Earth, whose symbol is $(m)∇$().$(br)  As such, it relates most strongly to ordinary life, materiality, hard work, development, natural growth, stagnation, stability, realization, and the body.$(br)  The Pentacle of the Magician is the Power to Be Silent.
